div.p: This papyrus has been digitally edited by Tina Heindel and revised by Vincenzo Damiani as part of the Project Anagnosis and the Würzburger Zentrum für Epikureismusforschung

bibl.title: PHerc. 495 – PHerc. 558 (Filodemo, Storia di Socrate e della sua scuola?). Edizione, commento, questioni compositive e attributive
Herkulanensische Bruchstücke einer Geschichte des Sokrates und seiner Schule
